name: blend no. 55 | CALM
description: petitgrain, geranium, rose otto, lavender 5 ml bottle 55 brings together smells from the places which have brought Issa peace throughout her life. Geranium and lavender used to tame irritability. Issa uses rose otto for restlessness and agitation. Petitgrain is used as a "shock absorber". All oils are packaged in bottles Issa procures specially for their likeness to the colorful and hazy beach glass that filled her pockets on a recent trip to the Amalfi coast.

name: blend no. 101 | AROUSE
description: jasmine, vetiver, neroli, lavender 5 ml bottle 101 benefits from years of a traveler’s tales, plus a tip that jasmine and neroli make for a fail-proof aphrodisiac. Inspired by a good friend of Issa’s whose stories of India always highlighted the smells — the food, the flowers — it is sensuous and sweet, yet grounded. All oils are packaged in bottles Issa procures specially for their likeness to the colorful and hazy beach glass that filled her pockets on a recent trip to the Amalfi coast.

name: blend no 505 | BALANCE
description: vetiver, rose otto, patchouli, lavender 5 ml bottle 505 is pure foresty goodness. Earthy yet crisp, this well-rounded scent wears nicely on both women and men year round. Vetiver and patchouli work well together to ward off fatigue and depression. All oils are packaged in bottles Issa procures specially for their likeness to the colorful and hazy beach glass that filled her pockets on a recent trip to the Amalfi coast.

name: 3-pack of all blends | CALM, AROUSE, BALANCE
description: Enjoy all three of our perfected blends. Our three pack of oils comes with handmade display board. BLEND 55 | CALM petitgrain, geranium, rose otto, lavender BLEND 101 | AROUSE jasmine, vetiver, neroli, lavender BLEND 5O5 | BALANCE vetiver, rose otto, patchouli, lavender 5 ml bottles All oils are packaged in bottles Issa procures specially for their likeness to the colorful and hazy beach glass that filled her pockets on a recent trip to the Amalfi coast.

name: face + body toner | ROSE WATER
description: Our toner is ideal for all skin types to balance, tone, and restore skin. Lavender and Rose toner promotes cell repair, is an excellent coolant for minor burns and sunburns, and soothes sensitive skin. Mist the face and body to cool a hot flash or calm your mood. How To Use 100% Pure Organic Lavender Face and Body Toner or our organic Lavender and Rose toner: Hold bottle about 10 inches away and begin to mist face, neck, decollete and anywhere else your skin needs replenishment and hydration. 100% Natural, 100% Vegan, Gluten-free Organic Lavender/Rose Hydrosol is the collection of the steam from the production of pure Lavender and Rose essential oil from steam distillation. Hydrosol contains the same medicinal properties as essential oil. Lavender and Rose hydrosol will hydrate, refresh and soothe all skin types. Made from organic Lavender and Rose contains no synthetic chemicals, artificial fragrances, alcohol, preservatives or any other toxins. • Great for all skin types • Calming and soothing • All natural • 100% vegan • Made with organic ingredients • Synthetic chemical-free • Paraben-free and no other toxic preservatives • Sulfate-free and no other harsh detergents • Artificial fragrance-free & artificial color-free • Alcohol-free • Phthalates-free and petro-chemical-free • Propylene glycol-free and PEG-free • No animal by-products are used • Animal cruelty free • Does not contain fillers - never watered down with water, thickeners, emulsifiers or other fillers • Does not contain any GMO ingredients • Biodegradable

name: face + body toner | LAVENDER
description: Our toner is ideal for all skin types to balance, tone, and restore skin. We have left out the rose for this one. Lavender by itself also promotes cell repair, is an excellent coolant for minor burns and sunburns, and soothes sensitive skin. Our lavender hydrosol used in our toners is distilled from freshly harvested lavender. Mist the face and body to cool a hot flash or calm your mood. How To Use 100% Pure Organic Lavender Face and Body Toner or our organic Lavender and Rose toner: With eyes closed, hold bottle about 10 inches away and begin to mist face, neck, decollete and anywhere else your skin needs replenishment and hydration. 100% Natural, 100% Vegan, Gluten-free Organic Lavender is the collection of the steam from the production of pure Lavender essential oil from steam distillation. Hydrosol contains the same medicinal properties as essential oil. Lavender hydrosol will hydrate, refresh and soothe all skin types. Made from organic Lavender, contains no synthetic chemicals, artificial fragrances, alcohol, preservatives or any other toxins. • Great for all skin types • Calming and soothing • All natural • 100% vegan • Made with organic ingredients • Synthetic chemical-free • Paraben-free and no other toxic preservatives • Sulfate-free and no other harsh detergents • Artificial fragrance-free & artificial color-free • Alcohol-free • Phthalates-free and petro-chemical-free • Propylene glycol-free and PEG-free • No animal by-products are used • Animal cruelty free • Does not contain fillers - never watered down with water, thickeners, emulsifiers or other fillers • Does not contain any GMO ingredients • Biodegradable

name: THE BALM
description:
Offers protection and relieves chapped or cracked lips; shields lips from drying effects of wind & cold weather. Leaves lips feeling soft and smooth.

The Balm’s Natural oils, butters, and waxes can protect skin from further damage as they moisturize and restore.

Thinner than any other area of the face, the lips are defenseless against subtle changes in wind, temperature and dryness — requiring extra special attention. The Balm is a luxurious and intensely reparative formula that works on contact to soften roughness, relieve discomfort and help rejuvenate seriously dry lips.
 
Did you know that you can also use Hollow & Ridge’s The Balm to tame flyaways, moisturize dry elbows, cuticles, and knuckles? The Balm is great for unruly eyebrows, and even the ends of your hair. The ingredients add moisture and hydrate other areas just like the lips.
